movies.name: The Matrix 3
movies.overview: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

movies.name: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.overview: Six months after the events depicted in The Matrix, Neo has proved to be a good omen for the free humans, as more and more humans are being freed from the matrix and brought to Zion, the one and only stronghold of the Resistance. Neo himself has discovered his superpowers including super speed, ability to see the codes of the things inside the matrix and a certain degree of pre-cognition.

movies.name: Saw 3D
movies.overview: SAW legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

movies.name: Blitz 007
movies.overview: A tough, renegade cop with a gay sidekick is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. AÇIKLAMA AÇIKLAMA

movies.name: Hostage
movies.overview: When a mafia accountant is taken hostage on his beat, a police officer – wracked by guilt from a prior stint as a negotiator – must negotiate the standoff, even as his own family is held captive by the mob.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.overview: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.name: I Am Legend
movies.overview: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
This Film is about King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: Game of Thrones
movies.overview: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.

movies.name: Vikings
movies.overview: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.

movies.name: Gotham
movies.overview: The story behind Detective James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival

movies.name: Power
movies.overview: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

movies.name: Narcos
movies.overview: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

movies.name: Breaking Bad
movies.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's financial future.

movies.name: Doctor Strange
movies.overview: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

movies.name: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.overview: The Rebellion makes a risky move to steal the plans to the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

movies.name: Assassin's Creed
movies.overview: When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society.
